meanings.definition: A person of no importance or influence.
meanings.sent1: The nobodies in the background were easily overlooked.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of nobodies, just regular folks enjoying themselves.
meanings.sent3: The nobodies decided to throw a surprise party for the boss.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, we are all just nobodies in the universe.
meanings.sent5: The nobodies in the crowd faded into the shadows of the night.

meanings.definition: People who are not famous or well-known.
meanings.sent1: The nobodies on the street went about their day unnoticed.
meanings.sent2: The event was attended by nobodies, but everyone had a great time.
meanings.sent3: The nobodies formed a secret club for ordinary people.
meanings.sent4: In a world of celebrities, the nobodies found solace in their anonymity.
meanings.sent5: The nobodies lived their lives away from the spotlight, content in their simplicity.
